author: psmith
msg: Fixed the Tab navigation hotkeys so they work whatever component is
Also turned off Table grid lines as per Sun's Java L&F guidelines.  Will
eventually make this a Preference-able item, but for now we'll at least
attempt to stick with the Guidelines... Until we get sick of them ourselves!

author: sdeboy
msg: Corrected JDK1.4 logging via xml/socket - was previously only processing events when socket closed - now the decoder is responsible for buffering partially-received logging events and returning only complete events to xmlsocketnode.

author: sdeboy
msg: Added ctrl-left, ctrl-right tab selection, but more work needs done (action not triggered when detail pane active, etc.)
